email_subject: Check out the new CLIE PEG-T665C from Sony! (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The CNET Shopper Newsletter: PDA Edition is here to bring you the latest and greatest in PDA technology. This week, we're featuring the new CLIE PEG-T665C from Sony. With a 66MHz processor, transflective LCD, 16MB of RAM, and MP3 playback, this PDA is sure to impress. And at just $354, it's a steal. Don't forget to check out our selection of accessories for this PDA, including a mini keyboard, AC adapter, memory stick module, and carrying case. And for even more great deals, be sure to sign up for ChannelOnline, where you can compare product specifications and get the best prices. Happy shopping!
